queries.query: CREATE TABLE `files` (`id` int(11) NOT NULL, `links` varchar(1000) NOT NULL, `source` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `time_updated` varchar(250) DEFAULT NULL ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1
CREATE TABLE `new_detected` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL, `new_files` varchar(1000) NOT NULL, `source` varchar(1000) NOT NULL ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1
CREATE TABLE `sam_master_password` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL, `username` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `password` varchar(255) NOT NULL ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1

CREATE TABLE `status_checker` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL, `source` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `sam_status` enum('ON','OFF') NOT NULL, `insert_status` enum('INSERT','RUNNING') NOT NULL ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1
CREATE TABLE `timecheck` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL, `checktime` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `deltime` varchar(255) NOT NULL ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1
ALTER TABLE `files` ADD PRIMARY KEY (`id`);
ALTER TABLE `new_detected` ADD PRIMARY KEY (`id`)
ALTER TABLE `sam_master_password` ADD PRIMARY KEY (`id`)
ALTER TABLE `status_checker` ADD PRIMARY KEY (`id`)
ALTER TABLE `timecheck` ADD PRIMARY KEY (`id`)
ALTER TABLE `files` MODIFY `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT
ALTER TABLE `new_detected` MODIFY `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT
ALTER TABLE `sam_master_password` MODIFY `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT
ALTER TABLE `status_checker` MODIFY `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT
ALTER TABLE `timecheck` MODIFY `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT
CREATE TABLE `folders` (`id` int(11) NOT NULL, `folder_name` varchar(1000) NOT NULL, `source` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `time_updated` varchar(250) DEFAULT NULL ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1
ALTER TABLE `folders` ADD PRIMARY KEY (`id`);
ALTER TABLE `folders` MODIFY `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT
CREATE TABLE `new_folder_detected` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL, `new_files` varchar(1000) NOT NULL, `source` varchar(1000) NOT NULL ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1
ALTER TABLE `new_folder_detected` ADD PRIMARY KEY (`id`)
ALTER TABLE `new_folder_detected` MODIFY `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT
